org.codepond.android.wizardroid

Class Wizard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codepond.android.wizardroid.Wizard

  • public class Wizard
extends Object
    Class to control the wizard flow. Normally you will want to use WizardActivity instead of using this class directly for a more managed and simple usage. Use this class to enhance your WizardActivity or to compose your own WizardActivity.
